SEARCH
Package trpg.service

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
trpg.service.GameService
@Service public class GameService extends Object
Game logic service for TRPG damage calculations. Extracted from main.Main class to follow Spring Boot best practices.

    • dice

      public int dice(int dices, int sides)
      Roll dice and return the total.
      Parameters:
      dices - Number of dice to roll
      sides - Number of sides on each die
      Returns:
      Total of all dice rolls

    • diceWithOutput

      public GameService.DiceResult diceWithOutput(int dices, int sides)
      Roll dice with detailed output.
      Parameters:
      dices - Number of dice to roll
      sides - Number of sides on each die
      Returns:
      Result containing total and message

    • sideDamage

      public GameService.SideDamageResult sideDamage(int finalDamage, int stat)
      Calculate side damage based on final damage and stat. sideDamage = (최종 데미지) * Math.Max((스탯-D20), 0) * 0.1
      Parameters:
      finalDamage - Final damage after passive/multiplier
      stat - Stat to use
      Returns:
      Result containing side damage and messages

    • verdict

      public GameService.VerdictResult verdict(int stat)
      Perform a stat verdict check.
      Parameters:
      stat - Stat value to check against
      Returns:
      Result containing dice roll, success/failure, and messages

    • normalCalculation

      public GameService.NormalCalculationResult normalCalculation(int stat, int dices, int sides)
      Calculate normal damage with dice roll and side damage.
      Parameters:
      stat - Stat to use for side damage
      dices - Number of dice to roll
      sides - Number of sides on each die
      Returns:
      Result containing total damage and calculation details
